name: No full, no coming home Triip
description:
Ho Chi Minh city is not only famous for its beautiful scenes but also for its rich food culture. Apart from our traditional cuisines like Phở, Cơm tấm,... Our rich food culture also has many kinds of food whose name you've never heard about. 
For the people who love enjoying the South Vietnamese food, this triip is the most ideal one ever for you to book.
Going with me to a small alley in the centre of Ho Chi Minh city, you will absolutely be surprised with this alley. Do you know why i firmly said that you'll be surprised? Because this place is full of food and more food which looks very delicious and "ready to be eaten".
So what are you waiting for? Let's go and say "No full, no coming home".
